 Want to join The Hangar team? |

A Day in the life

John Riley

Strategist Intern

  • John joins Delta from the Scheller College of Business at Georgia Tech. Using his marketing lens, John helps direct Delta’s innovation to directly improve the customer travel experience. Through the discovery process, John helps coordinate projects with business units and harmonizes technology with the travel journey. In his off time, John is an avid traveler, reader, and music enthusiast.

Why join the Delta team at The Hangar?

Benefits

Enjoy a start-up atmosphere, with Delta flight benefits & competitive pay.

Experience

Work alongside industry leaders on impactful projects with key tech players.

Impact

Work on solutions for Delta that make a big impact throughout aviation.
